node.title: Police investigate Hamilton death as homicide
node.description: Police have launched a homicide investigation after the death of a man in Hamilton last night.
node.content:
["Police have launched a homicide investigation after the death of a man in Hamilton last night.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Patrice Allen\n
", "Hamilton City Area Commander Inspector Andrea McBeth said emergency services were called to a home on Vernall Street, in the suburb of Nawton, just after 5pm.", "A 37-year-old man was injured in an altercation and was unable to be revived.", "Inspector Andrea McBeth said a guard was at the address overnight and the scene will be examined this week."]
